All.title: Web Design Client Project
All.description: This website focused on past Web Design students and where they are now, what majors they are pursuing, and the jobs they can get
All.alt: Screenshot of Dominic Adragna's portfolio site

All.title: NJIT Project #2
All.description: This NJIT-based website uses Vue to display my top movies
All.alt: Screenshot of Abbie Marder's portfolio site

All.title: Little Bird Toy Company
All.description: This website was for a simulated wooden toy company, which showed the products and had a cart system to purchase the items
All.alt: Screenshot of Ryan Chung's portfolio site

All.title: College Recruitment
All.description: This website highlighted why Carnegie Mellon is a good school for pursuing technology and outlined the majors, programs, and student life
All.alt: Screenshot of Brandon Winecoor's portfolio site

All.title: Rock Paper Scissors Website
All.description: This fun, interactive website used Javascript functions and switch statements to build a RPS Game
All.alt: Screenshot of Brandon Winecoor's portfolio site

All.title: MHS Trunk or Treat
All.description: This website displayed Marlboro High School's annual Trunk or Treat, showcasing notable decorations and providing info on the event
All.alt: Screenshot of Brandon Winecoor's portfolio site

All.title: NJIT Project #1
All.description: This NJIT Project is an interactive photo gallery of my favorite episodes from the series House MD
All.alt: Screenshot of Brandon Winecoor's portfolio site

All.title: Lucky Me Lottery
All.description: This website randomly selects one of the entered names, essentially picking who wins the lottery
All.alt: Screenshot of Brandon Winecoor's portfolio site

All.title: Work Based Learning Project
All.description: This website is for my client, who wants to show off her videography knowledge and past works while building a name for herself
All.alt: Screenshot of Brandon Winecoor's portfolio site
